schema.name: Healthyfied Cajun Chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the chicken breasts by trimming any excess fat.
In a small bowl, mix together thyme, rosemary, ground black pepper, and cajun style seasoning.
Rub the seasoning mix onto both sides of the chicken breasts.
Preheat a skillet over medium heat and add butter.

Once the butter is melted, add the seasoned chicken breasts to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes on each side or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C), adjusting the heat as necessary to prevent burning.
Drizzle the Kikoman over the chicken during the last minute of cooking.

schema.description: This Healthyfied Cajun Chicken recipe is perfect for those who are looking for a tasty, high-protein, and low-carb meal. It's seasoned with a spicy cajun style seasoning, fresh thyme, and rosemary, making it a flavorful yet health-conscious choice. Suitable for anyone looking to maintain a healthy diet without compromising on taste.
